sentence.Network_en: Auricularia Auricular polysaccharide, a physiological active substance, was very hot recently.
sentence.Network_cn: 黑木耳多糖作为一种生理活性物质, 近年来日益受到人们的重视.

sentence.Network_en: Different technologies for extraction of auricularia polysaccharide were studied in this paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了黑木耳多糖的不同提取方法.

sentence.Network_en: To study the effect of Auricularia polysaccharide on reducing blood lipid in this experiment.
sentence.Network_cn: 本试验研究了黑木耳多糖的降血脂作用.
